title: [New Zealand Weekly Review. No. 202]
creator_contributor_role: New Zealand National Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Industries - New Zealand
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/New Zealand - Rural conditions
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/New Zealand - Social life and customs
description: Newsreel items:  1. Highbank - largest power unit in New Zealand in operation. Also provides water for irrigation and power in the Canterbury basin. 2. Christchurch - woollen manufacture. School children learn by ancient methods the art of spinning wool. 3. Italy - donkey derby. 26th Batallion New Zealand Division hold spring meeting. 4. Rehabilitation - the man on the land. Ex-servicemen attend training farm to help establish themselves back into civvy life. 5. Wellington lunch hour concert.
